rukus.text: Zai zi qi de qingzhuang zhi xia zhong tianshen shi qi siwang de ren, zhong tianshen biding wen tamen shuo:`Sheng de nimen shi zai shenme qingzhuang zhi xia ne!'Tamen shuo:`Women zai difang shang shi bei ren qifu de.'Tamen wen:`Nandao zhenzhu de dadi bushi kuankuo de, neng rong nimen qianyi de ma?'Zhe deng ren de guisu shi huo yu, na shi yige elie de guisu.
Wei lao ruo he furu, tamen ji wuli qianyi, you bu renshi daolu.
Zhe deng ren, zhenzhu huoxu shu rao tamen. Zhenzhu shi zhi shu de, shi zhi she de.

Shui wei zhu dao er qianyi, shui zai da dishang faxian xuduo chulu, he fengfu de caiyuan. Shui cong jia zhong chuzou, yu qian zhi zhenzhu he shizhe nali, er zhongtu siwang, zhenzhu bi baochou shui. Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.
